statements: SELECT * FROM video_performance_reports;
SELECT video_id, date, views FROM video_performance_reports WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT video_id, views, conversions FROM video_performance_reports WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id AS id, clicks AS total_clicks FROM video_performance_reports ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT AVG(views) AS avg_views, AVG(conversions) AS avg_conversions FROM video_performance_reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM video_performance_reports WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_id, views FROM video_performance_reports WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT video_id, SUM(views) AS total_views FROM video_performance_reports GROUP BY video_id HAVING total_views > 5000;
SELECT video_id, clicks, (conversions / clicks) AS conversion_rate FROM video_performance_reports ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT video_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM video_performance_reports GROUP BY video_id HAVING num_reports > 3 ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM VideoPerformanceReports;
SELECT video_title, views_count, likes_count, dislikes_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports;
SELECT video_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM VideoPerformanceReports GROUP BY video_id;
SELECT report_id, video_title, created_date FROM VideoPerformanceReports ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions_count, clicks_count, conversion_rate FROM VideoCampaignMetrics WHERE marketing_cost > 1000;
SELECT video_title, views_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports WHERE dislikes_count < 10;
SELECT video_title, likes_count, dislikes_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports WHERE views_count > 1000 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT video_title, views_count, likes_count, dislikes_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT video_title, impressions_count, clicks_count, conversion_rate FROM VideoCampaignMetrics WHERE marketing_cost < 500 ORDER BY impressions_count ASC;

SELECT video_title, likes_count, dislikes_count, views_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports WHERE likes_count > dislikes_count AND video_id IN (SELECT video_id FROM VideoCampaignMetrics WHERE campaign_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM video_performance_reports;
SELECT video_id, views, clicks FROM video_performance_reports WHERE views > 1000;
SELECT * FROM video_metadata ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, duration, upload_date FROM video_metadata WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM video_performance_reports;
SELECT title, views FROM video_performance_reports JOIN video_metadata ON video_performance_reports.video_id = video_metadata.video_id;
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM marketing_strategies WHERE budget > 2000;
SELECT video_metadata.title, video_performance_reports.views FROM video_metadata LEFT JOIN video_performance_reports ON video_metadata.video_id = video_performance_reports.video_id;
SELECT video_metadata.title, COUNT(*) AS views_count FROM video_performance_reports JOIN video_metadata ON video_performance_reports.video_id = video_metadata.video_id GROUP BY video_metadata.title;
SELECT video_title, views_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports;
SELECT strategy_name, platform, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingStrategies;
SELECT video_id, duration, category FROM VideoDetails ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT log_id, report_type, timestamp, user_id, status FROM ReportGenerationLogs WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM VideoPerformanceReports WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT video_title, views_count, likes_count FROM VideoPerformanceReports WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT video_title, category, duration FROM VideoDetails WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT report_type, timestamp, user_id FROM ReportGenerationLogs WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, platform, end_date FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT video_title, tags FROM VideoDetails WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(tags) > 2 ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT title, category FROM videos WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT name, age, location FROM viewers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT video_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM video_performance_reports WHERE performance_value > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM marketing_strategies WHERE budget < 1000;
SELECT * FROM video_performance_reports WHERE performance_metric = 'Views';
SELECT video_id, performance_metric FROM video_performance_reports WHERE performance_value > 5000;
SELECT viewer_id, name, age, location FROM viewers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT v.title, v.category, e.engagement_level FROM videos v JOIN engagement_metrics e ON v.video_id = e.video_id WHERE e.engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT m.strategy_name, m.budget, v.title FROM marketing_strategies m JOIN videos v ON m.strategy_id = v.video_id WHERE m.budget >= 10000;
